attributes.action: Link pension/wages %rises to energy %rises to enable people/veterans to live
attributes.additional_details: Link pension/wages %rises to energy %rises to enable people/veterans to live. I would like the government to appreciate that you are here because of us & assist us in trying to enjoy our final years so that our/your offspring can understand why we are alive today. The energy companies profits are excessive & bonuses the managers are getting for WHAT ? making a ridiculous profit in their pockets. I would bet non of these have served in any of the armed forces, but then neither has most of our leaders.
